summary: Allows you to craft and improve Silver weapons with the Arcane Blacksmith Perk.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small mod that allows you to craft and improve Silver weapons once you have the Arcane Blacksmith Perk.

[u]Recipes[/u]

- Silver Sword: 2x Silver Ingot, 1x Leather Strap and 1x Filled Petty Soul Gem
- Silver Two-Handed Sword: 3x Silver Ingot, 1x Leather Strap and 1x Filled Petty Soul Gem

I have a personal dislike for mods that overly unbalance the game, so I\'ve tried not to make this too easy. Both require 2xSilver Ingot to improve.
author: Drat Vanity
